.. _`design_system_components_icon`:

Icon
====

.. figure:: images/component_icon.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Icon component for displaying icons at several sizes. It is widely used in the context of button, menu entry, data display, navigation, link etc.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.Icon.__module__`

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.SVGIcon.__module__`

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.BitmapIcon.__module__`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_iconandlabel`
